column2: Jr. PLanning Enng B. Tech/Diploma in Mechanical Engineering preferably with relevant Experience in Scheduling and planning using project planning tools. In-depth knowledge of oil & gas refineries TA maintenance, tasks & technologies.             Ability to analyze data and make decisions based on thorough analysis.             Proven ability to manage multiple priorities, adapt quickly to changes, and deliver results in a fast-paced environment. Align with Project Progress Measurement System in line with Client requirements. 4.           Establishing and monitoring project progress based on key milestones and performance indicators (KPIs). 5.           Providing timely schedule impact reviews and integrated project schedule updates.

column1: Senior Software Support Executive |  Enterprise Applications
column2: ** Important Information ** This position is not for Freshers / Inexperienced persons. Prior Experience in  Software Testing / QA  and/ or  Software Support  is mandatory. Immediate Joiners would be preferred There would be  No Work from Home  (WFH) option for this position. The Organisation  Inspira Software Services Pvt. Ltd. , an established software product and services company, specialising in development of Enterprise Business Process Automation software products.The company has been helping top notch companies automate their business processes over  three decades .Online business process automation software of the company, e.g. top of the line Service CRM, ERP, Project Management software etc. run on Cloud servers, are designed for 24x7 operations for enterprise customers and are offered under the SaaS (Software as a Service) model.  The Position We are inviting applications for the role of  Senior Software Test Engineer  for our Enterprise software products, spanning domains like CRM, ERP, and Project Management. N O T E The position involves providing software testing services for an  MNC  customer organisation headquartered in  Gurugram / Gurgaon , Delhi NCR, among other key responsibilities. The incumbent would be responsible for providing proactive software testing support to the users of the company's  Service CRM software  product  Inspira CRM - Service  which is being used for managing countrywide field service operations for premium consumer durable equipment. ___________________________________________________________ Job Description Responsibilties in Software Support - Provide online and on-premises training and implementation support on company's software products to end users. - Provide post-implementation support for software to end users by understanding issues reported by them. - Coordinate with the product engineering team and get customer complaints resolved (support tickets raised by customers) within relevant timelines. - Assist customers in migration of legacy data during implementation of software. - Track bugs reported by end users of software products and get these resolved by coordinating with the product engineering team, - Understand new requirements of customers in terms of addition of features or changes in existing system. Help converting business requirements into technical requirements and design, and develop system acceptance criteria, functional test plans with a focus on coverage, performance and automation. - Keep track of the issues reported by customers and resolutions thereof in CRM software. - Conducting customer satisfaction surveys and taking feedback from end users of software. - Contribute in the improvement of software products by providing feedback on the same to the product engineering team. ____________________________ Responsibilties in Software Testing / QA Immerse yourself in a comprehensive understanding of our enterprise business process automation software products, including CRM, ERP, Project Management, and related Mobile Applications. Devise test plans, scenarios, scripts, and procedures for new software modules, including  Functional Testing, Regression Testing, User Acceptance Testing (UAT), Performance Testing,  Load Testing, Integration Testing, Usability Testing. Mobile App Testing:  Test mobile applications for compatibility, functionality, and performance. Execute tests in accordance with the test plans. Analyze test results and provide detailed reports to the development team. Collaborate closely with the development team to rectify bugs and resolve errors. Create, execute, and document test cases, logging defects and sharing recommendations with the project team. Actively support end users during the user acceptance testing (UAT) phase, ensuring a smooth transition for newly developed software or software modules. Track and manage reported software issues in cooperation with the product engineering team. Play a crucial role in translating business requirements into technical specifications, system acceptance criteria, and functional test plans, with a focus on coverage, performance, and automation. Assist customer organisations in migrating legacy data during implementation of enterprise software products. Maintain a record of customer-reported issues and their resolutions in the CRM software. Conduct customer satisfaction surveys, gathering feedback from software end users. Contribute to software product improvement by providing feedback to the product engineering team. Desired Applicant Profile: Educational qualification: Graduate degree in Science/Technology or Diploma in Software Development/IT. Key Skills -  Prior experience in enterprise software quality assurance, software testing, and support.  Knowledge of automated testing is preferred, though not mandatory.Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Proficiency in testing processes, tools, and methodologies. Familiarity with RDBMS and SQL, including the ability to write SQL queries for testing software. Exceptional troubleshooting skills with a talent for root cause analysis. Quick grasp of software product functionalities. Independence, ownership, a pleasant personality, and patience. Effective spoken and written English communication skills. Active listening skills. A customer-centric attitude and the desire to assist users in effectively using our software products. Proficiency in MS Office software, particularly MS Excel. Willingness to travel to other cities for official assignments when necessary. Salary - Salary is negotiable and would be commensurate with Industry Experience / Qualification and would not be a constraint for deserving professionals.  In addition to fixed monthly salary, periodic performance linked incentives would be offered.
column11: Requirements Analysis, Implementation Support, Software Support, Defects Management, Bug Tracking, QA Testing, Business Analyst, Software Testing, Software Test Engineer, Software Service Delivery

column2: Skill required:  Insurance Services - Research and Development Operations Designation:  Service Delivery Ops Senior Analyst Qualifications: MTech/Phd  Years of Experience: 5 to 8 years  Language - Ability: English - Proficient  What would you do? "We help insurers redefine their customer experience while accelerating their innovation agenda to drive sustainable growth by transforming to an intelligent operating model. Intelligent Insurance Operations combines our advisory, technology, and operations expertise, global scale, and robust ecosystem with our insurance transformation capabilities. It is structured to address the scope and complexity of the ever-changing insurance environment and offers a flexible operating model that can meet the unique needs of each market segment.Insurance is a legal agreement between two parties the insurer and the insured, also known as insurance coverage or insurance policy. The insurer provides financial coverage for the losses of the insured that s/he may bear under certain circumstancesIn Research & Development, you will be responsible for development of programs and research programs to help maintain a strong pipeline of product innovations." What are we looking for? " Insurance Risk Management Microsoft SQL Server Python (Programming Language) Property and Casualty Insurance Statistical Analysis Problem-solving skills Strong analytical skills Written and verbal communication Experience in research and development Collaboration and interpersonal skills Ph.D/M.Tech./B.Tech in Engineering / Meteorology or related discipline Strong background in probability and statistics Minimum 3 - 5years experience in catastrophe risk modeling Strong computer skills, including Python, R, Matlab, GIS and SQL Excellent analytical, writing, communication, and organizational skills"  Roles and Responsibilities:  " . Develop cutting edge underwriting and portfolio management tools for risk assessment from tropical/extra-tropical cyclones, winter storms, tornado/hail/Wildfire. Conduct research to create or validate existing Catastrophe models for select regions around the world.  Examine the scientific basis of commercial Catastrophe models from vendors such as RMS and AIR-Worldwide, identify possible biases and erroneous assumptions and provide remediating actions to establish the view of risk. Interact with internal and external stakeholders to communicate the established view of risk. Part of your job is to educate underwriters and Cat modelers on the specifics of the view of risk and seismic risk assessment in general. Ability to analyze large datasets (climate, hazard, claims, etc.) to develop solutions for underwriting profitability and risk management strategies." Qualification MTech,Phd

column1: Hiring Senior Visa Filing & Operations Executive
column2: Job Overview:   We are looking for a dedicated Senior Visa Filing & Operations Executive with expertise in visa consulting and application processes for various countries including Hong Kong, USA, UK, Dubai, UAE, and Europe. This role demands a thorough understanding of different visa requirements and a proactive approach to managing the entire visa application process from start to finish. Key Responsibilities: Analyze visa applicants' profiles to determine the most appropriate visa category based on their professional background and the specific requirements of their destination country. Conduct comprehensive research on visa regulations and maintain up-to-date knowledge of changes in immigration laws across various countries. Prepare detailed lists of required documents for visa applications and assist applicants in gathering all necessary documentation. Manage the complete visa application process, ensuring all forms are filled out accurately and all documents are properly submitted. Provide ongoing support and advice to applicants, addressing any queries they may have throughout the process. Liaise with consulates and embassies to ensure smooth processing of applications. Ensure compliance with all regulatory and legal requirements associated with visa applications. Qualifications: Proven experience in visa filing and operations, with a strong background in handling visas for multiple countries. In-depth knowledge of international travel regulations and visa requirements. Exceptional organizational skills and attention to detail. Strong communication and interpersonal skills, capable of effectively guiding clients through complex processes. Ability to handle multiple tasks simultaneously in a fast-paced environment. What We Offer:  Join our team and contribute to a dynamic international environment where you can make a significant impact on the travel and mobility of individuals around the world. We offer competitive compensation, comprehensive benefits, and opportunities for professional growth. Application Process:  Interested candidates should submit their resume via email at neelesh@thefutureperfectglobal.com & can also call or whatsapp at +919755299999.

Ireland Demand Management  Work closely with hiring managers and project leadership for contractor demand fulfillment Co-ordinate interview process with projects and suppliers- Screening, scheduling and selection process Negotiate cost factors with suppliers to the project budgetThe Workforce Management team focuses on maximizing performance levels and competency for an organization. This includes activities needed to maintain a productive workforce, such as field service management, human resource management, performance and training management, data collection, recruiting, budgeting, forecasting, scheduling, and analytics. This team owns the client relationship and partner on Capacity Planning/Schedule Adherence, help gather insights and provide feedback on the gaps/opportunities in performance capacity. The team helps identify, evaluate and drive continuous improvement in Service Delivery Performance. This team is also responsible for innovation in the workforce management space - providing insights to Accenture and Client leadership on improving efficiencies. They also ensure adherence to revenue and cost targets, own efficiency improvement goals. This team also partners wit regional leads and ensure we are compliant on all internal and client audits. What are we looking for? Should have UK or any European country recruitment experience or outside India recruitment. Must have excellent written and verbal communication as this role demands to interact with UKI stakeholders Should have strong negotiation skills Ability to manage multiple stakeholders and escalations Should have exp in handling large volume recruitment Microsoft Excel Adaptable and flexible Ability to establish strong client relationship Written and verbal communication Ability to manage multiple stakeholders Agility for quick learning  Roles and Responsibilities: In this role you are required to solve routine problems, largely through precedent and referral to general guidelines Your expected interactions are within your own team and direct supervisor You will be provided detailed to moderate level of instruction on daily work tasks and detailed instruction on new assignments The decisions that you make would impact your own work You will be an individual contributor as a part of a team, with a predetermined, focused scope of work Please note that this role may require you to work in rotational shifts

column1: AES - Service Delivery Lead - Senior Associate
column2: As a      Manager     , youll work as part of a team of problem solvers, helping to solve complex business issues from strategy to execution. PwC Professional skills and responsibilities for this management level include but are not limited to:             Encourage everyone to have a voice and invite opinion from all, including quieter members of the team.             Deal effectively with ambiguous and unstructured problems and situations.             Initiate open and candid coaching conversations at all levels.             Move easily between big picture thinking and managing relevant detail.             Anticipate stakeholder needs, and develop and discuss potential solutions, even before the stakeholder realizes they are required.             Contribute technical knowledge in your area of expertise.             Contribute to an environment where people and technology thrive together to accomplish more than they could apart.             Navigate the complexities of cross-border and/or diverse teams and engagements.             Initiate and lead open conversations with teams, clients and stakeholders to build trust.             Uphold the firms code of ethics and business conduct.             Within our global, Managed Services platform, we provide Application Evolution Services (formerly Application Managed Services), where we focus more so on the evolution of our clients applications and cloud portfolio. Our focus is to empower our client s to navigate and capture the value of their application portfolio while cost-effectively operating and protecting their solutions.             Job Requirements and Preferences    :        Basic Qualifications    :          Minimum Degree Required: Bachelor Degree and/or 5 years Equivalent Experience           Preferred Qualifications    :      Preferred Knowledge/Skills:          Demonstrates expert abilities providing functional solutioning for the Guidewire Suite of applications on premises and SaaS, with proven success executing and leading all aspects of complex engagements within the Guidewire product suite achieving on-time and on-budget delivery, as well as the following:           Demonstrates expert abilities and extensive experience in Application Managed Service projects and providing functional solutioning for the Guidewire Suite of applications on premises and SaaS, with proven success executing and leading all aspects of complex engagements within the Guidewire product suite achieving on-time and on-budget delivery, as well as the following:             Demonstrates expert abilities managing ITIL Processes; Tracking SLA s, and contracting;             Demonstrates advanced abilities providing solution strategy and Application Evolution Services (AES, formerly AMS) delivery as a Guidewire Delivery Lead. Employees in the Delivery Lead position should think of themselves and be regarded by the client as a trusted advisor and think strategically about how to create value using the Guidewire Suite of products;             Demonstrates expert abilities with ITIL Incident and Problem management for the Guidewire Suite of applications as it will be critical that Managers in this position are capable of navigating both business processes as well as enterprise solution perspectives at high level and holistic view;             Demonstrates expert abilities and/or a proven record of success in leading proposal development efforts; Managers in these positions should be capable of delivering Advisory-level work and be able to discuss future enhancements in Guidewire roadmap discussions with the client;             With a focus on AES, demonstrates expert organization skills and abilities assisting clients in the support of Guidewire Suite solutions and improving business processes; and taking a proactive approach to quality;             Demonstrates expert abilities developing solutions based on common issues facing clients in all lines of the P&C Industries (e.g., Auto, Home, Commercial, Workman s Comp, etc.).             Demonstrates expert abilities identifying and addressing client needs by: Developing and sustaining impactful client relationships using networking, negotiation and persuasion skills to identify and sell potential new service opportunities; Preparing and presenting complex written and verbal materials; and, Defining resource requirements, project workflow, budgets, billing and collection;             Demonstrates expert abilities leading global teams to generate a vision, establishing direction and motivating members, creating a community of high performing professional consultants, creating an atmosphere of trust, leveraging diverse views, coaching staff, and encouraging improvement and innovation;             Managers will need to be held accountable for a team of resources from both a utilization and learning perspective. Mentoring and helping to upskill junior resources will be critical in this role;             Demonstrates intimate abilities and/or a proven record of success developing strategy as well as writing, communicating, facilitating, and presenting cogently; to and/or for all levels of industry audiences, clients and internal staff and management, such as presentation slides, practice marketing materials, change management plans and/or project plans, workshops and whitepapers, practice, methodologies and tools, policies and procedures, and/or other standard business communications;             Be comfortable, thrive, and available during sustained period of time of instability with clients Guidewire solution and escalations; and,             Key contributor and thought leader internally and externally with white papers, blogs, and training.           Technologies            Guidewire PolicyCenter, BillingCenter, ClaimCenter and ContactManager, including leading related project teams;             GOSU, Guidewire Event and Rules Framework and object oriented programming;             JAVA scriptwriting, emphasizing hosting and consuming web services that leverage Java;             Guidewire studio toolkits; XML Coding;             Code repository such as Clear Case, SVN, TFS;

column2: Skill required:  Reinsurance - Collections Processing Designation:  Function Delivery Associate Qualifications: BCom/MCom/Master of Business Administration  Years of Experience: 1 to 3 years  What would you do? We help insurers redefine their customer experience while accelerating their innovation agenda to drive sustainable growth by transforming to an intelligent operating model. Intelligent Insurance Operations combines our advisory, technology, and operations expertise, global scale, and robust ecosystem with our insurance transformation capabilities. It is structured to address the scope and complexity of the ever-changing insurance environment and offers a flexible operating model that can meet the unique needs of each market segment.You will be part of Reinsurance contract setup and doing one or more of the following: Setup of Reinsurance Contracts in the system Doing contract fixes  Ensuring accuracy in the process Liaising with stakeholders for approval Prepare SOP documentation Understanding system technicalities Doing ad-hoc activities What are we looking for? Collaboration and interpersonal skills Commitment to quality Results orientation Written and verbal communication Ability to perform under pressure  Roles and Responsibilities: In this role you are required to solve routine problems, largely through precedent and referral to general guidelines Your expected interactions are within your own team and direct supervisor You will be provided detailed to moderate level of instruction on daily work tasks and detailed instruction on new assignments The decisions that you make would impact your own work You will be an individual contributor as a part of a team, with a predetermined, focused scope of work Please note that this role may require you to work in rotational shifts Qualification BCom,MCom,Master of Business Administration

column2: Overview TekWissen Group is a workforce management provider operating throughout India and several other countries worldwide. The client below is a leading technology company offering a range of IT solutions to businesses and organizations, enabling them to transform their digital futures Position: Senior Engineer, Service Delivery Location: Bangalore, India Duration: 12 Months Job Type: Full Time Work Type: Remote Job Description: Key Responsibilities - Performs day to day server administration task for RHEL and Suse enterprise servers,coordinates with relevant team, principal vendors to ensure customer issues are getting fixed with in SLA. Performs Security and Kernel patching, hands on experience in Suse OS upgrades and Redhat Migration from 6.x to 7.x version. Proactive problem management, ensuring repetitive incidents are eliminate Should be able to handle P1 and P2 incidents independently and do deep drive technical troubleshooting able provide root cause analysis report. Change management process, should be well versed in ITIL process, responsible for changeplanning and execution. Required to work in 24*7 shift roster Performs specific delivery management activities. Working environment knowledge in Sap application and Sap HANA/oracle database. Knowledge about scripting python, shell script, should be able to automate day to day administration and mundane activities. Well versed in monitoring tools, should be able to fine tune monitoring parameters and recommend the best practices. Knowledge on configuration management tools like salt, ansible, puppet, chef would be added advantage. Essential Requirements: 5- 8 years relevant SUSE and Redhat administration experience with a Bachelor or Master Degree. Managing systems and troubleshooting Redhat and Suse enterprise Servers and Windows (optional) Knowledge of Virtualization (VMware) and Client storage product. Perform ongoing performance tuning, upgrades and resource optimization as directed. Solid troubleshooting methods, ability to interface with client, organization and follow through on projects Troubleshoot and diagnose advanced Linux server issues, including reliability issues, performance concerns, and software bugs. Strong Organizing and planning skills to oversee customer operations, solid problem solving and analytical skills. Knowledge about scripting python, shell script, should be able to automate day to day administration and mundane activities Experience with Red Hat OpenShift configuration, implementation, and support. Expertise with Kubernetes. Expertise working with Docker or similar container technologies. Prefered Openshift certificied (D0280/EX280) administrator. Desirable Requirements: RHCSA and RHCE certification. ITIL Foundation certification or coursework Excellent customer service attitude and communication skills. Demonstrated ability to learn new technologies quickly. Self-starter, works well with little oversight and prioritizes own work appropriately Knowledge about configuration tools like salt, ansible , puppet , chef Experience Range: Total Exp  5 - 8 years Rel Exp  5 years Mandatory Skills 3 Must have: Linux SUSE OS Skills TekWissen? Group is an equal opportunity employer supporting workforce diversity.

The client below is a leading technology company offering a range of IT solutions to businesses and organizations, enabling them to transform their digital futures Position: Service Delivery Engineer II Location: Bangalore Duration: 12 Months Job Type: Contract Work Type: Remote Daily Responsibilities Patching the Windows and Unix VM using patching tools Monitor alerting systems for system failures, addressing issues as they arise Respond to support and service request tickets Troubleshoot operating system issues and usability issues throughout the environment Install software, configure servers, implement security patches, and provide overall support of cloud computing environments. Respond to and remediate systems incidents. Root cause and failure analysis to resolve systems problem Experience in OS installation and doing upgrades, Software and Patch management Should have strong OS administration skills on Linux, SQL,Windows 2012, 2008R2 and Windows 2016. Familiarity with the fundamentals of Windows scripting languages Familiarity with load balancing, firewalls, etc. Maintain DNS, NIS, NFS and clustering QUALIFICATIONS - KNOWLEDGE  SKILLS- 2-4 years relevant experience managing systems and troubleshooting windows Servers Knowledge of Virtualization (VMware) Perform ongoing performance tuning, upgrades and resource optimization as directed. Solid troubleshooting methods, ability to interface with client, organization and follow through on projects Troubleshoot and diagnose advanced windows server issues, including reliability issues, performance concerns, and software bugs. Demonstrated ability to learn new technologies quickly Self-starter, works well with little oversight and prioritizes own work appropriately Flexible to work in 24/7 Environment Experience Range: Total Exp  2-4 years Rel Exp ??2 years Mandatory Skills 3 Must have: Windows servers, VMware and Cloud TekWissen? Group is an equal opportunity employer supporting workforce diversity.

column2: Role & Responsibilities Texas Capital Bank is built to help businesses and their leaders. Our depth of knowledge and expertise allows us to bring the best of the big banks at a scale that makes sense for our clients, with highly experienced bankers who truly invest in peoples success  today and tomorrow.  While we are rooted in core financial products, we are differentiated by our approach. Our bankers are seasoned financial experts who possess deep experience across a multitude of industries. Equally important, they bring commitment  investing the time and resources to understand our clients immediate needs, identify market opportunities and meet long-term objectives. At Texas Capital Bank, we do more than build business success. We build long-lasting relationships.   Headquartered in Dallas, Texas Capital Bank has offices in Austin, Fort Worth, Houston, Richardson, Plano and San Antonio. We serve clients across the nation in a variety of industries. For more information about joining our team, visit texascapitalbank.com. Brief Overview of Position Loan Support & Imaging Specialists primary responsibility is to image all incoming loan packages into the imaging system. This position is responsible for general vault maintenance including the filing and tracking of loan documents and collateral files. Loan Support & Imaging Specialists assist the operations department and business units with various requests. Requirements Minimum 12 months office/administration experience including mail distribution and filing Excellent customer service experience  Able to work in a highly collaborative team environment High level of prioritizing and organizational skills required Ability to maintain concentration amid distractions in an open environment  Must be able to respond quickly to department demands and perform multiple tasks simultaneously High attention to detail required on each task  Demonstrates strong written and verbal communication skills Effective problem-solving abilities Functional knowledge of Microsoft Suite Products (including Teams, Outlook, Word and Excel) Ability to lift boxes up to 75 lb.   Responsibilities    Responsible for imaging loan packages and recorded documentation into imaging system  Responsible for imaging paid loan packages into imaging system  Responsible for distribution of operations department mail   Assist with operations department supply requests   Assist business units and operations staff with various requests  Maintain collateral vault, manage and track internal collateral file requests   Maintain production logs daily to ensure timely month end reporting
column11: Credit Delivery, imaging loan, loan package, Loan Support, Imaging Specialist, paid loan
